definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: A gas - filled ionization chamber uses this principle.
sentences.chinese: 充气电离室就是利用这一原理。

sentences.english: All of them can be used as secondary standard Rontgen meter and in protection dose measurement.
sentences.chinese: 上述电离室可作次级标准伦琴计和防护剂量测量用。

sentences.english: The author, in parallel with krcmar, is experimenting with giant ionization chambers.
sentences.chinese: 本文作者与克尔马克尔正在同时试验巨型电离室。

sentences.english: So this method provides an effective means for studying the dynamical characteristic of gas filled ionization chamber.
sentences.chinese: 该方法为电离室动态特性的研究提供了一种有效手段。

sentences.english: The electrode is made of high atomic number metal.
sentences.chinese: 电离室电极用高原子序数的金属制造。

sentences.english: A scattering light sensor and an ionization chamber were simulated.
sentences.chinese: 模拟了一个散射光感器和一个电离室。

pinyin: ban4 dao3 ti3 tan4 ce4 qi4
